name: Thred32
short_description:
Thred32, an open-source Delphi project translated from the famous Thred: The Embroidery Software and Designs.

Thred (and also Thred32) is a versatile and free digitizing program for embroidery machines. 
Thred is originally developed by Morin McCoskey. 
http://www.thredworks.com/features.php


The name Thred comes from the words thread and editor combined, but it's more than just an editing program for finished designs

Finally Thred32 is attended because developers love and uses large part of Graphics32 Library :)
summary: Delphi version of famous free embroidery-digitizing software: Thred
